remarks: A theorem used to prove the base case of the Eliminability Theorem (see section comment).  (Contributed by BJ, 19-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
eliminable2a $p |- ( x = { y | ph } <-> A. z ( z e. x <-> z e. { y | ph } ) ) $.
$d ph z $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
